member.name: XAPO_BUFFER_FLAGS
member.summary: Describes the contents of a stream buffer.

member.name: XAPO_BUFFER_FLAGS.XAPO_BUFFER_SILENT
member.summary: Stream buffer contains only silent samples.

member.name: XAPO_BUFFER_FLAGS.XAPO_BUFFER_VALID
member.summary: Stream buffer contains audio data to be processed.
